body.name: Janwold Dash Cam Front and Rear with WiFi GPS and Speed, 4K Dual Dash Camera for Car, Loop Recording, Parking Mode, Clear Night Vision, Car Camera with Extra 64G TF Card
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 1 hr 24 mins
features: 【4K+1080P Dual Dash Cam】Capture crystal-clear footage of your front and rear roads with our advanced car dash cam. It features a front camera with a stunning 4K resolution (3840*2160P) and a rear camera with 1920*1080P resolution. Say goodbye to blind spots thanks to the wide-angle lenses of 170° (front) and 150° (rear), ensuring you have complete and clear evidence in case of accidents.

【Built-in GPS and WiFi】This car dash cam front and rear with gps and speed, you can easily view the driving route, location, speed, and time on the app. The wifi connection is very convenient to access recorded videos and share your videos with your friends and family after downloading the video.

【Loop Recording & G-Sensor】Don't worry about running out of storage space with our included 64GB U3 SD card, expandable up to 256GB. Our car camera dash cam front and rear supports loop recording, automatically overwriting the oldest unlocked videos when the memory card is full. Plus, the high-sensitivity gravity sensor detects any collisions. The car camera will lock and record 30 seconds after a collision, preserving crucial evidence that won't be deleted in loop recording mode.

【Voice Control】With our 2-channel dash camera, you'll enjoy the convenience and safety of 11 voice commands: turn on screen, turn on audio, show front camera, take photo, lock the video, turn off screen, turn off audio, turn on wifi, turn off wifi, etc, allowing you to control the device hands-free while driving.

【Super Night Vision】The car camera adopts wide dynamic range (WDR) technology and HDR technology, upgrades the high-performance Starvis image sensor, and can enhance clarity in low-light conditions.Ensures recording ultra HD video even in dark conditions.

【24 Hours Parking Mode】Our dash cam front and rear offers 24-hour parking mode, providing continuous protection for your vehicle. It automatically starts recording and saves the current video when any movement or collision is detected. Safeguard your car from bumps and scratches, even when parked. Requires Smart Hardwire Kit(Sold separately ASIN:B0CF8JHRY7)

【Worry-Free After-sale Service】Janwold dash camera for cars provide 30-day refund and 18-month warranty, provide 7x24 hours of comprehensive assistance to each customer. Please feel free to contact us when you encounter problems, we will provide you with 100% satisfactory service.
